column6: Cause
column7: Remedy

column3: Arc generation confirmation signal is not inputted within the time at the arc atarting.
column6: Fail in arc generation
column7: Remove the slag and check the wire feeding so that the power flow can be applied to the wire tip.

column6: Unstable wire supply
column7: Check the devicies for the wire feed, motor,  clamp, conduit cable, torch and feed state of a wire.

column6: The main power supply of the welding machine is not on.
column7: Turn on the welding machine.

column6: The power cable of the welding machine is not connected to the torch or the base metal.
column7: Check the polarity and the connection of the power cable of the welding machine.

column6: Welding instruction cable including arc generation confirmation signal is disconnected.
column7: Check if there is any breaking wire at the welding instruction cable.

column3:
Arc shortage occurred during arc welding.
Arc shortage signal was turned ON during arc welding.
Or Arc generation confirmation signal was truned OFF during arc welding.
column6: Wrong welding condition
column7: Adjust welding condition.

column6: The error occurred in the welding machine.
column7:
(1)Wait until the error at the welding machine is released. 
(2)Cycle the power of the welding machine.

column6: Unstable wire supply
column7: Check the devicies for the wire feed, motor,  clamp, conduit cable, torch and feed state of a wire.

column6: The power cable of the welding machine is not connected to the torch or the base metal.
column7: Check the polarity and the connection of the power cable of the welding machine.

column6: Welding instruction cable including arc generation confirmation signal is cut.
column7: Check if there is any breaking wire at the welding instruction cable.

column3: The plus side of the power cable is connected to the base metal.
column6: The power cable of the welding machine is not connected to the torch or the base metal.
column7: Check the polarity and the connection of the power cable of the welding machine.

column3:
Gas shortage occurred during arc welding.
Gas shortage signal was turned on in arc welding.
column6: A gas flow amount sensor detects the reduction of a gas flow amount.
column7: Check the devices for gas supply; gas tap and gas hose.

column6: Wrong detection of a gas flow amount sensor.
column7: Check the setting for gas flow amount sensor, or sensor power source ON.

column3:
Wire shortage occurred during arc welding.
Wire shortage signal was turned ON during  arc welding.
column6: The wire sensor detected the shortage.
column7: Check charge of the wire.

column6: Wrong detection of A wire sensor.
column7: Check the setting for wire detection sensor, or sensor power source ON.
